name: Writers
description: Writers is a game where you play as a writer and try to be the first in typing random excerpt from the book. Fight against your friends or players around the world, make your way to the top and show them speed you are capable of. Become a member of Writer's club and master all language leagues!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 1.2 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
